TestCase.TestCaseTitle: 1 BSO update (implicit update) in two topics.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Assess how systems handle BSOs that are included in multiple Topics (and subsequently updated), especially when a Consumer receives both topics.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates two BSOs in its National C2I which are included in two topics. Nation B requests from Nation A both topics and receives them. Nation A updates one BSOs in one of the two topics. Nation B requests the new BSO status from Nation A and receives it. The BSOs will be updated in both topics.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The test is passed if Nation B receives the updated BSOs status from Nation A. The BSOs should be updated in all affected Topics.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates two BSOs included in two Topics.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation A can see BSOs in its C2IS

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation B requests from Nation A both topics.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives BSOs from Nation A

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates one BSO from one Topic
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation A can see the BSO updated in all affected Topics.
Nation B displays BSO updated in all affected Topics.
